column4: Hey, how do I add an application that uses the "sh" command or the "./" on the panel?
and then type the whole command
I'm not sure where to put the sh or the ./
I tried that and it doesn't work.
how does it not work? try typing it in the term
does it matter if there is an espace character in the path to the file?
YES! You mean a space? If there is, then you have to put the whole path in ""
Then it's a binary file. You first have to make it executable and then run it without sh.
okay, this one only seems to work with the "./"
